Actions.Name: Retrieve Account Information
Actions.Description: Information of the active API endpoints, rate limits and usage for an account.

Actions.Name: Investigate Domain
Actions.Description: Retrieves the infrastructure and whois data associated with a domain or comma-separated list of up to 100 domains.

Actions.Name: Return Domains from Search Hash
Actions.Description: Import up to 500 domains from Iris Investigate into the Sentinel platform. Export your investigation by search hash (Iris Investigate -> Search -> Export). Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot MX Host
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains with a mail server on a provided domain name. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot by MX IP
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains served by a given mail server IP. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot Nameserver Host
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains served by a provided nameserver host. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot by Nameserver IP Address
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains served by a provided nameserver IP. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot by Registrant Name
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains exactly matching the provided Whois registrant field. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot by Registrant Org
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains exactly matching the provided Whois registrant organization field. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot SSL Email
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains with a given email address on the SSL certificate. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Pivot by SSL Hash
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains with a SSL certificate matching a provided SHA-1 hash. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Return Tagged With All
Actions.Description: Retrieve up to 500 domains tagged within the Iris Investigate UI. Given a comma-separated list of tags, returns domains that are tagged with ALL of the tags. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Return Tagged With Any
Actions.Description: Retrieve up to 500 domains tagged within the Iris Investigate UI. Given a comma-separated list of tags, returns domains that are tagged with ANY of the tags. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Reverse Email
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains with an email address on the most recently available Whois record, DNS SOA record or SSL certificate. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Reverse Email Domain
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains with the domain portion of an email address on the most recently available Whois or DNS SOA record. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.

Actions.Name: Reverse IP
Actions.Description: Returns up to 500 domains that last resolved to a given IPv4 address an active DNS check. Use the optional 'active' and 'date updated after' parameters to pre-filter the result set.
